verses.verse: And I turned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> mine eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and, behold, there came <WH3318> four <WH702> chariots <WH4818> out <WH3318> <WH8802> from between two <WH8147> mountains <WH2022>; and the mountains <WH2022> were mountains <WH2022> of brass <WH5178>.
In the first <WH7223> chariot <WH4818> were red <WH122> horses <WH5483>; and in the second <WH8145> chariot <WH4818> black <WH7838> horses <WH5483>;
And in the third <WH7992> chariot <WH4818> white <WH3836> horses <WH5483>; and in the fourth <WH7243> chariot <WH4818> grisled <WH1261> and bay <WH554> horses <WH5483>.
Then I answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me, What are these, my lord <WH113> ?

And the angel <WH4397> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, These are the four <WH702> spirits <WH7307> of the heavens <WH8064>, which go forth <WH3318> <WH8802> from standing <WH3320> <WH8692> before the YY <WH113> of all the earth <WH776>.

The black <WH7838> horses <WH5483> which are therein go forth <WH3318> <WH8802> into the north <WH6828> country <WH776>; and the white <WH3836> go forth <WH3318> <WH8804> after <WH310> them; and the grisled <WH1261> go forth <WH3318> <WH8804> toward the south <WH8486> country <WH776>.

And the bay <WH554> went forth <WH3318> <WH8804>, and sought <WH1245> <WH8762> to go <WH3212> <WH8800> that they might walk to and fro <WH1980> <WH8692> through the earth <WH776>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Get you hence <WH3212> <WH8798>, walk to and fro <WH1980> <WH8690> through the earth <WH776>. So they walked to and fro <WH1980> <WH8691> through the earth <WH776>.

Then cried <WH2199> <WH8686> he upon <WH853> me, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, these that go <WH3318> <WH8802> toward the north <WH6828> country <WH776> have quieted <WH5117> <WH8689> my spirit <WH7307> in the north <WH6828> country <WH776>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Take <WH3947> <WH8800> of them of the captivity <WH1473>, even of Heldai <WH2469>, of TobiYAH <WH2900>, and of Jedaiah <WH3048>, which are come <WH935> <WH8804> from Babylon <WH894>, and come <WH935> <WH8804> thou the same day <WH3117>, and go <WH935> <WH8804> into the house <WH1004> of Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> the son <WH1121> of TZ'fanyah-yahu <WH6846>;

Then take <WH3947> <WH8804> silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, and make <WH6213> <WH8804> crowns <WH5850>, and set <WH7760> <WH8804> them upon the head <WH7218> of Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Josedech <WH3087>, the high <WH1419> Kohen <WH3548>;

And speak <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus speaketh <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold the man <WH376> whose name <WH8034> is The BRANCH <WH6780>; and he shall grow up <WH6779> <WH8799> out of his place, and he shall build <WH1129> <WH8804> the temple <WH1964> of the YY <WH3068>:

Havahn he shall build <WH1129> <WH8799> the temple <WH1964> of the YY <WH3068>; and he shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the glory <WH1935>, and shall sit <WH3427> <WH8804> and rule <WH4910> <WH8804> upon his throne <WH3678>; and he shall be a Kohen <WH3548> upon his throne <WH3678>: and the counsel <WH6098> of peace <WH7965> shall be between them both <WH8147>.

And the crowns <WH5850> shall be to Helem <WH2494>, and to TobiYAH <WH2900>, and to Jedaiah <WH3048>, and to Hen <WH2581> the son <WH1121> of TZ'fanyah-yahu <WH6846>, for a memorial <WH2146> in the temple <WH1964> of the YY <WH3068>.

And they that are far off <WH7350> shall come <WH935> <WH8799> and build <WH1129> <WH8804> in the temple <WH1964> of the YY <WH3068>, and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto you. And this shall come to pass, if ye will diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> obey <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.
